books.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.description: The first of three volumes of the epic novel The Lord of the Rings by the English author J. R. R. Tolkien.
books.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

books.title: The Two Towers
books.author: J. R. R. Tolkien2
books.description: The second volume of the novel The Lord of the Rings by J. R. R. Tolkien.

books.title: The Return of the King
books.description: The third and final volume of J. R. R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings, following The Fellowship of the Ring and The Two Towers.
books.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

books.title: The Hobbit
books.description: The Hobbit, or There and Back Again is a children's fantasy novel by English author J. R. R. Tolkien.
books.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

books.title: The Silmarillion
books.description: The Silmarillion is a collection of mythopoeic works by English writer J. R. R. Tolkien, edited and published posthumously by his son, Christopher Tolkien, in 1977, with assistance from Guy Gavriel Kay.
books.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

books.title: The Children of Húrin
books.description: The Children of Húrin is an epic fantasy novel which forms the completion of a tale by J. R. R. Tolkien. He wrote the original version of the story in the late 1910s, revised it several times later, but did not complete it before his death in 1973.
books.author: J. R. R. Tolkien
